companies.name: Dell
companies.other_information: Dell's mission is to be the most successful computer company in the world at delivering the best customer experience in markets we serve.

companies.name: HP
companies.other_information: Our vision at HP is to create technology that makes life better for everyone, everywhere; and our mission is to create experiences that amaze.

companies.other_information: lead in the creation, development and manufacture of the industry's most advanced information technologies, including computer systems, software, networking systems, storage devices and microelectronics.

companies.name: Tidal
companies.other_information: Tidal's primary mission is to design, develop, and implement technology solutions that meet or exceed the specifications set forth by our customers.

companies.name: Logitech
companies.other_information: To continue growing and nurturing a diverse and inclusive company culture that strives for fair representation, access, and opportunity for advancement at all levels of the company.
